## Checklist

- [ ] Type checking passes (mypy for Python, tsc for TypeScript)
- [ ] All tests pass (pytest for backend, Playwright for frontend)
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed

- [ ] No dependency conflicts introduced
- [ ] Security considerations reviewed (no credentials, API keys exposed)
